channel.title: We name them Keepers of The Gauntlet!
channel.description:
![657815|620x413](upload://eytpgWv3wSptsGqjnnEZlC64GZV.jpeg)
We would like to thank our new March/April 2019 Patrons and name them Keepers of The Gauntlet!
(Also: if you're wondering why there isn't a creepy picture like normal... look closer.)
Henning Pfeiffer, Keeper of Marcelline Murdoch's Porcelain Eye Tim Kuehlhorn, Keeper of the Grand Radiance Logan Bright, Keeper of the Flourishing Spore Ricardo Esteves, Keeper of the One Who Sees Through Clouds Shanon Daly, Keeper of the Fire of Nal-K’aa Aaron Taylor, Keeper of the Final Syllable, Which Must Not Be Uttered Christopher Lindström, Keeper of the Tabard of St. Jasmine the Blessed Ancusohm, Keeper of the Stone Queen’s Egg Joe England, Keeper of the Autumnal Princedoms Raghava Kovvali, Keeper of the Ten Corpulent Archons Nick Bate, Keeper of the Most Delectable Wyrm Viscera Finn Brightwell, Keeper of the Shrine of Melchior the Maggot Michael Bacon, Keeper of the Thirteen Rhyming Spells of Kiesow Adam Alexander, Keeper of the Seven Splints of the Demon Crown Imani Dean, Keeper of the Constantly Weeping Justicar Ryan Dziuba, Keeper of the Melody Glades Devin Preston, Keeper of the Vermillion Embers Adam Good, Keeper of the Holy Blood Sponge Bill Garrett, Keeper of the Child Who Has No Shadow Linda H. Codega, Keeper of the Wreckage of the Bright Pier's Twin Pearl Zare, Keeper of the Lost Teeth of Skive Coldheart Philip Rogers, Keeper of the Manifest of the Ship of the Damned Robert Walther, Keeper of the Ministry of Embers Jex Thomas, Keeper of the Thousands of Worms in the Shape of a Man Benjamin A. B. McMullen, Keeper of the Sad Tale of Alvin Horoux Mark H, Keeper of the Blade of the One-Armed Swordsman SageZero, Keeper of the Meat Orchards Eli Seitz, Keeper of the Ravenous Barrow Allen White, Keeper of the Puppet That Whispers Truth When You Sleep Dustin K. Miller, Keeper of the Cult of Hyaenas William Munn, Keeper of the Wailing Queen’s Almanac Sean G, Keeper of the Woman Who Is Always Just Behind You Vasilis Liaskovitis, Keeper of the Eighty-Seven Near-Silent Years Ari Tobias, Keeper of the Cat With Seven Eyes But No Soul Neil MacBeth, Keeper of the Atlas of Vanished Countries Katrina, Keeper of the Four Brides Married to Each Other And Themselves Craig Campbell, Keeper of the Djinn's Four Gifts Adam Smith, Keeper of the Forest That Means No Harm At All Samuel E.H. Yeager, Keeper of the Seed-Sacks of Jonjon Applecore Nathan Lawrence, Keeper of the Deep Riddle Dunes Johnstone Metzger, Keeper of the Toad That Refuses to Believe It Is Not. A Man Cameron M. Miller, Keeper of the Nectar Which Shall Never Touch Our Lips Markus Widmer, Keeper of the Neon Demon David Ariño Montoya, Keeper of the Algorithmic Tones Volsung, Keeper of the Invention of Murder Jack Graham, Keeper of the Injurious Corpse Flower Sean Duffy, Keeper of the REDACTED TITLE G. Michael Truran, Keeper of the Charming but Murderous Ne'er-do-well Nathaniel Styer, Keeper of the Self Referential Loop of the Keeper of the AJ Nichols, Keeper of the GIF that Gets More Sinister With Each Loop Richard Kreutz-Landry, Keeper of the Elegant Wreck of the Demeter Rob Wilson, Keeper of the First Starlight Greg Sharek, Keeper of the Ruined Legacy Joseph Wisniewski, Keeper of the Endless Page Nick Edwards, Keeper of the Apostate's Silvered Skulls Brandon Hinton, Keeper of the Ministry of Embers Brian, Keeper of the Autumnal Princedoms Maximillian Martin, Keeper of the Joyous Pit Ian Johnson, Keeper of the Wanting Widows of Thon the Promiscuous Sam Marshall, Keeper of the Five Limbs of Acolla Parham Doustdar, Keeper of the Zombie Queen's Pheromones Per Falk, Keeper of the Unlit Effigy Hans, Keeper of the Last Thought of the Last God Mat Danaher, Keeper of the Three-Sided Coin Saribel Pages, Keeper of the Djinn's Four Gifts Caroline Walker, Keeper of the Testifier’s Skull Leah Sargeant, Keeper of Leopard’s Precious Child Tobie Abad, Keeper of the Moon Llama King Joe Boyd, Keeper of the Epilogue from Writings Beyond the Black Gate Archmage Aulin, Keeper of the Turtle-plate Greaves of Old King Marwen William, Keeper of the Hand of Crador, Blind God of the Kubora Becky, Keeper of the Record of Where We Have Been Daniel Silva De Oliveira, Keeper of O-Yanma’s Blood-Soaked Trail

item.title: We name them Keepers of The Gauntlet!
item.dc:creator: @Alexi_Sarge
item.description:
@Alexi_Sarge wrote:

Leah Sargeant, Keeper of Leopard’s Precious Child

…I see what you did there!

Read full topic
item.source: We name them Keepers of The Gauntlet!

item.title: We name them Keepers of The Gauntlet!
item.dc:creator: @RedMagus77
item.description:
@RedMagus77 wrote:

Ahh, the spring crop of Gauntleteers is looking pretty ripe this year.
Looking forward to backing so many future Kickstarters and itch.io games from yall

Read full topic
item.source: We name them Keepers of The Gauntlet!
